1.content: Create Cloudflare Worker for R2 Image Management
1.details:
Build a Cloudflare Worker that:
1. Scans the R2 bucket for product images
2. Automatically generates CDN URLs
3. Updates Supabase database with image URLs
4. Handles bulk imports and real-time syncing
5. Matches images to products using naming convention

2.details:
1. Configure R2 API access in Worker
2. Implement bucket scanning functionality
3. Handle image file detection and categorization
4. Process naming convention: [category]/[subcategory]/[product-slug]/[view].webp

3.details:
1. Set up Supabase client in Worker
2. Create database update functions
3. Handle product matching and URL storage
4. Implement upsert logic for existing products

4.details:
1. /sync-all - Full R2 to Supabase sync
2. /sync-new - Import only new images
3. /verify-links - Check all URLs are working
4. /webhook - Real-time sync on R2 uploads

5.details:
1. Deploy Worker to Cloudflare
2. Test with sample products
3. Run bulk import on existing images
4. Verify admin panel integration
